EmailTemplate.name: 201904_BK_Webinar_Alternative_Methods_of_Investment_in_Avionics_MC.201904_Americ
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for Registering for BendixKing Webinar on May 7
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://www.bendixking.com/]]> WEBINAR | Alternative Methods of Investment In Your Avionics Hello {{lead.First Name:default=valued customer}}, Thank you for registering for the upcoming webinar - Alternative Methods of Investment In Your Avionics.
Join Robert Haim and Sapan Shah as they share how BendixKing has created an efficient eco-system to enable aircraft owners to carefully assess their choices in investing in new instruments. Topics include traditional and new methods of investment in your aircraft’s avionics, discussion of pros and cons of each and focus specifically on what you, as an owner, need to consider in your decision process.
Webinar Details: Date: May 7, 2019 Time: 8-9 a.m. PST (11a.m.-12 p.m. EST)
Join GoToMeeting: Click here <[[https://global.gotomeeting.com/join/357808461]]> to access the webinar.
<[[https://collaborate.honeywell.com/Dialin?id=67845900]]>New to GoToMeeting? Get the app now and be ready when your first meeting starts: https://global.gotomeeting.com/join/357808461 <[[https://global.gotomeeting.com/join/357808461]]>
Thank you,
BendixKing Event Team
